paper_title: Almost multiplicative maps with respect to almost associative operations on Banach algebras
abstract:
We prove an Ulam type stability result for a non-associative version of the
multiplicativity equation, that is, $T(xy)=\Psi(T(x),T(y))$, where $T$ is a
unital bounded operator acting from an amenable Banach algebra to a dual Banach
algebra.
